MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v3 - B1: Evaluation Form — Physical

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

VISION.Description: Without corrective lenses, is the subject's vision functionally normal?

VISCORR.Description: Does the subject usually wear corrective lenses?

VISWCORR.Description: If yes, is the subject's vision functionally normal with corrective lenses? (Blank if VISCORR ≠ 1)

HEARING.Description: Without a hearing aid(s), is the subject's hearing functionally normal?

HEARAID.Description: Does the subject usually wear a hearing aid(s)?

HEARWAID.Description: If yes, is the subject's hearing functionally normal with a hearing aid(s)?
